name: Giesecke+Devrient
goal: With over 165 years of experience, G+D is actively helping shape one of the most important trends of the future: security. The long established technology group creates confidence in global payment transactions, modern communication, digital identities, and data security, by providing innovative products and solutions.
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Competition, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Digitaler Binnenmarkt; Binnenmarktthemen
- Payment Services
- Cybersecurity
- Handelspolitik
- F&E
